com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.3Extr.description: If the user encounters a game over screen he can start all over, or he can buy this consumable pack that gives him 3 characters and 15 more weapons so he can continue where he left off.
com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.3Extr.title: Continue Pack 2

com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.Extra.description: If the user encounters a game over screen he can start all over, or he can buy this consumable pack that gives him another character and 10 more weapons so he can continue where he left off.
com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.Extra.title: Continue Pack 1

com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.TestC.description: This is just a test consumable!
com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.TestC.title: Test Consumable

com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.revea.description: Reveals all the mines in the current level.
com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.revea.title: Reveal Mines

com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.5Extr.description: If the user encounters a game over screen he can start all over, or he can buy this consumable pack that gives him 5 characters and 20 more weapons so he can continue where he left off.
com.hangovergames.minefieldmadness.5Extr.title: Continue Pack 3
